Introduction¶

Welcome to PartsGenie’s documentation. This tool provides a docker that calls a PartsGenie REST service.

docker build -t brsynth/partsgenie-standalone .

You can run the docker using the following command:

python run.py -input test/input.sbol -input_format sbol -taxonomy_input 8333 taxonomy_format string -output test/test_output.sbol

API¶

class run.main¶

The docker of the client to call the PartsGenie service

Parameters

  • server_url (str) – The ip address of the Pars Genie REST instance

  • output (str) – The path to the output file

  • inputfile (str) – The path to the input file

  • input_format (str) – The input type of the gile. Suported input: tar, sbml

  • taxonomy_input (str) – The taxonomy id

  • taxonomy_format (str) – The format of the taxonomy id. Valid options: json, str

Return type

bool

Returns

The success or failure of the function

PartsGenie
